alert.note: Alert for Jefferson (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 04 at 11:45AM EST until January 05 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM EST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Freezing rain expected. Total ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch possible near the Saint Lawrence River, with little or no freezing rain from Watertown southward. * WHERE...Northern portions of Jefferson county near the Saint Lawrence River. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 10 AM EST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel may be very difficult at times with untreated surfaces becoming very slippery and hazardous. Ice may result in a few tree limbs coming down and isolated power outages.
info.instruction: Periods of freezing rain will result in slick roads. Slow down and use caution while driving. Submit ice reports through our website or social media.
